data.title: The perfect sub
data.text: I stopped by to try a sub ,  parking is not easy but found a spot .Very good subs i got a medium ,a whole is almost an arms length.I am going back because it was so good.Also very friendly employees.

data.title: Finally!
data.text:
I have been trying to eat at Mello's for about a month,but everytime I went to go something came up and they were closed (they close at 5).

The subs are huge. If it's your first time,you might want to let them know so they can explain the sizes. 

I got a mixed sub and it was great. A real old fashioned,good,full sub. 

If you can get there before 5pm,I'd definitely recommend it! We'll be going back for sure.

data.title: Great subs
data.text: Great submarine sandwiches that the owner makes right in front of you with exactly what you want on it.  Good lunch specials with chips and a soda too.

data.title: Excellent SUBS! Good price and great ingredients.
data.text: Always consistent and always tasting great. just the right amount of  ingredients and always fresh. Great place!

data.title: Awesome food, horrible manners
data.text: The subs are amazing!  The bread is fresh and soft and the meats are the best.  Wish I could say the same for the owners attitude.  My co-workers and I wanted to place an order, however, we did not have any menus and could not find one on-line anywhere.  We called at 9:30 in the morning to get an estimate on prices for small and large subs.  The person answers and says hello.  I asked for prices and he says, oh I can't give that, they range.  I said I understand that but can I just get a range for small and large.  He asks "have you been in here before?" And I replied yes....he says then you know what we have.  I said I know what you have but it's been a few years I didn't memorize the prices.  He says I can't do this, I can't do this right now I'm prepping food and so on.  For the time it took him to argue with me, he could have just shot me a few prices.  He continued to argue when I said there was a bunch of us ordering and we wanted a rough estimate as I know they also have a special....he just continued to argue.  I had to hang up on him.  Although it's a good business with good food, you do not treat people this way......someone's manners need to be adjusted big time.

data.title: I love little small sub shops
data.text:
Got out of a meeting in Utica early and I was hungry. While walking back to my car I spotted this small little sub shop so, of course, I had to try it. I was certainly not disappointed. Delicious Sub for a decent price! 
Various size rolls, plenty of options to choose from, and extremely friendly staff!
One side note, you must pay in cash only. I completely understand because small, awesome sub places like this won't be able to make a profit if they get hit hard from credit card transaction fees.

data.title: Great sub for linch
data.text: Place is not much to look at and located in downtown Utica but has good subs. You wait in line while the owner makes your sub in front of you.

data.title: Outstanding Hometown Sub Shop
data.text: There are a plethora of sandwich and sub shops out there, but our favorite in Utica is Mello's. Friendly staff, not a chain, excellent fresh ingredients

data.title: great service
data.text: Mello's is a small place that only serves cold subs but they are delicious.  I had a turkey sub on my visit there and the fresh bread was packed with meat all for a very reasonable price.

data.title: Best subs in Utica!!!
data.text: The subs here are outstanding! Best subs in Utica! You order at the counter and they make it right there, eat in or take out. This place is great!
